name: Mustard Jelly
conimmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 16

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Energy Absorption
traits.desc: A mustard jelly is immune to force and lightning damage. If the jelly would have taken force or lightning damage, it is instead healed for the same amount it would have taken in damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Poison Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the jelly’s turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage. A creature that touches the jelly or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and 10 (3d6) acid damage.
